00022 #include "Common/Error.h"
00023 #include "Common/Logger.h"

00025 #include "AsyncComm/ResponseCallback.h"
00026 #include "Common/Serialization.h"

00028 #include "RequestHandlerCreate.h"

00030 using namespace Hypertable;
00031 using namespace Hypertable::DfsBroker;
00032 
00036 void RequestHandlerCreate::run() {
00037   ResponseCallbackOpen cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00038   const char *fileName;
00039   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00040   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00041   uint16_t sval, replication;
00042   uint32_t ival, bufferSize;
00043   uint64_t blockSize;
00044   bool overwrite;
00045 
00046   if (remaining < 18)
00047     goto abort;
00048 
00049   // overwrite flag
00050   Serialization::decode_short(&msgPtr, &remaining, &sval);
00051   overwrite = (sval == 0) ? false : true;
00052 
00053   // replication
00054   Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &ival);
00055   replication = (short)ival;
00056 
00057   // buffer size
00058   Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &bufferSize);
00059 
00060   // block size
00061   Serialization::decode_long(&msgPtr, &remaining, &blockSize);
00062 
00063   // file name
00064   if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msgPtr, &remaining, &fileName))
00065     goto abort;
00066 
00067   // validate filename
00068   if (fileName[strlen(fileName)-1] == '/') {
00069     HT_ERRORF("open failed: bad filename - %s", fileName);
00070     cb.error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILENAME, fileName);
00071     return;
00072   }
00073 
00074   m_broker->create(&cb, fileName, overwrite, bufferSize, replication, blockSize);
00075 
00076   return;
00077 
00078  abort:
00079   HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with CREATE message");
00080   cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with CREATE message");
00081   return;
00082 }
